content: फुल्ल {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} (of फल्) {@--1@} Expanded, opened, blown; पुष्पं च फुल्लं नवमल्लिकायाः प्रयाति कांतिं प्रमदाजतानां <ls>Rs. 6. 6</ls>; फुल्लारविंदवदनां <ls>Ch. P. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Flowering, blossomed; <ls>R. 9. 63.</ls> {@--3@} Expanded, dilated, wide opened (as eyes). {@--4@} Smiling, gay. --ल्ल A fullblown flower.
